name: Reconnaissance - Search Open Technical Databases (T1596)
description: Detects attempts to query public technical sources such as GitHub, WHOIS, SSL transparency logs, or Pastebin for reconnaissance purposes. Attackers use these open databases to gather information about the target's infrastructure and code.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.name:(powershell.exe OR cmd.exe OR curl.exe OR git.exe) AND (process.args:(*Invoke-WebRequest* OR *curl* OR *git clone* OR *whois* OR *nslookup* OR *Resolve-DnsName* OR *crt.sh* OR *api.github.com* OR *pastebin.com*))
